mapper.insert:
select hope_working_seq.nextval from dual
insert into hope_working (hopework_code, hopeWorkDate, hopePay, hopeWorkForm, local_code, btype_code3, third_code) values(#{hopworkCode},#{hopeworkdate},#{hopepay},#{hopeworkform},#{localCode},#{btypeCode3},#{thirdCode})

select certificate_seq.nextval from dual
insert into certificate (l_no, l_name, l_getdate, l_institution) values (#{lNo}, #{lName}, #{lGetdate}, #{lInstitution})

select education_seq.nextval from dual
insert into education (academic_code, schoolName, major, degree, graduatecheck, schoolLocal, graduatetype, graduate2, graduate) values (#{academicCode},#{schoolName},#{major},#{degree},#{graduateCheck},#{schoollocal}, #{graduatetype},#{graduate2},#{graduate})

select LANGCERTIFICATION_seq.nextval from dual
insert into LANGCERTIFICATION (langlicence_code, langlicencename, institute, certificationtype, language, langpoint, lang_grade, lang_getdate) values (#{langLicenseCode},#{langLicenseName}, #{institute}, #{certificationtype}, #{language}, #{langpoint}, #{langGrade}, #{langGetdate})

select career_seq.nextval from dual
insert into CAREER(dv_code, companyname, chargework, workcheck, jobGrade,workcondition, workterm2,workterm) values(#{dvCode}, #{companyname}, #{chargework}, #{workcheck}, #{jobgrade}, #{workcondition}, #{workterm2}, #{workterm})

select resume_seq.nextval from dual
insert into resume (resume_code, resumeTitle, introduce, award, langlicence_code, licence_code, dv_code, academic_code, desiredwork_code, member_code,picture) values(#{resumeCode}, #{resumeTitle}, #{introduce}, #{award}, #{langlicenceCode}, #{licenceCode}, #{dvCode}, #{academicCode}, #{desiredWorkCode}, #{memberCode}, #{picture})
